name: Mahjong Titans Saved Game
summary: Learn about .MAHJONGTITANSSAVE-MS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you save a game while closing Mahjong Titans, you will be prompted to resume the saved game the next time you open the program.
NOTE: Mahjong Titans was renamed as Mahjong and the MAHJONGTITANSSAVE-MS file is no longer used to save games.

description: Saved game file created by Mahjong Titans, a mahjong solitaire game included with Windows Vista and Windows 7; saves the current state of the game so it can be continued at a later time.
